titleStmt.title: A martial conference pleasantly discoursed betweene two souldiers, the one Captaine Skil, trained vp in the French and Low Country seruices, the other Captaine Pill, only practised in Finsburie fields in the modern warres of the renowmed Duke of Shordich and the mightie Prince Arthur / newly translated out of Essex into English by Barnabe Rich ...
titleStmt.author: Rich, Barnabe, 1540?-1617.

publicationStmt.publisher: For Iohn Oxenbridge, dwelling in Paules Church yardat the signe of the Parrot,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Jesus College (University of Cambridge). Library.

place.placeName: Paules Church yardat the signe of the Parrot
